alert.note: Alert for Concho (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:08PM CDT until June 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH...NORTHEASTERN MENARD...NORTHWESTERN MASON AND SOUTHEASTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 508 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Us-190 Near The Menard-Mcculloch County Line, or near Calf Creek, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Calf Creek around 610 PM CDT. Hext around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 190 Near The Menard-Mcculloch County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
